- Super Centro Carioca de Vacina√ß√£o Botafogo (Rua General Severiano, 91): Funciona de domingo a domingo, das 8h √†s 22h.
- Super Centro Carioca de Vacina√ß√£o Campo Grande (ParkShoppingCampoGrande, 2¬∫ andar): Funciona de domingo a domingo, conforme hor√°rio do shopping, geralmente das 10h √†s 22h (domingos e feriados, das 12h √†s 22h).

## 6) Atendimento √† gestante

### 6.1) Orienta√ß√µes para gestantes (antes do parto):

Perguntar se trata-se de um atendimento de emerg√™ncia relacionado √† gesta√ß√£o (exemplo: dor muito forte na barriga ou no peito, sangramento intenso, desmaio ou perda de consci√™ncia) ou se √© algum atendimento regular (consulta pr√©-natal, acompanhamento p√≥s-parto, etc). Sendo identificada situa√ß√£o de emerg√™ncia, perguntar se √© poss√≠vel chegar at√© o local por meios pr√≥prios. Se informado que pode ir at√© o local por meios pr√≥prios, direcionar para a maternidade mais pr√≥xima. Caso n√£o consiga se deslocar, orientar a solicitar o SAMU. Caso a gestante queira informa√ß√µes sobre consultas de rotina como consultas pr√©-natal, direcionar para a unidade de aten√ß√£o prim√°ria mais pr√≥xima, considerando Cl√≠nicas da fam√≠lia (CF) e Centros Municipais de Sa√∫de (CMS)).
Al√©m disso, se entender que a gestante est√° em est√°gio inicial de gravidez ou que necessita de informa√ß√µes sobre a rede de suporte oferecida pela prefeitura, comentar sobre o Programa Cegonha Carioca. No endere√ßo https://saude.prefeitura.rio/cegonha-carioca/ constam informa√ß√µes sobre o programa municipal, que envolve agendamento da visita guiada √† maternidade de refer√™ncia, recebimento do kit enxoval do beb√™ e transporte de ambul√¢ncia at√© a maternidade no momento do parto. Para se cadastrar no Programa Cegonha Carioca, a gestante deve realizar o pr√©-natal em uma cl√≠nica da fam√≠lia ou centro municipal de sa√∫de no Rio de Janeiro. O cadastro √© feito durante o pr√©-natal, e a gestante recebe o "Passaporte Cegonha", que indica a maternidade de refer√™ncia para o parto.

### 6.2) Orienta√ß√µes ap√≥s o parto (m√£es ou pais em per√≠odo p√≥s-parto e que rec√©m tiveram filho):

√â crucial lembrar que, ap√≥s a alta da maternidade, seu beb√™ deve ter uma primeira consulta de rotina com o pediatra ou enfermeiro da Cl√≠nica da Fam√≠lia ou Centro Municipal de Sa√∫de nos primeiros 3 a 7 dias de vida. Essa consulta de puericultura √© essencial para avaliar a adapta√ß√£o do beb√™, ganho de peso, amamenta√ß√£o, realizar testes importantes (como o Teste do Pezinho, se n√£o foi feito na maternidade) e tirar d√∫vidas.
Caso identificado alguma situa√ß√£o com o beb√™ ap√≥s a alta (per√≠odo neonatal imediato, geralmente at√© 2 semanas ap√≥s o nascimento) ou alguma condi√ß√£o que j√° estava sendo monitorada pela equipe que o atendeu, devemos orientar que o cidad√£o procure preferencialmente a maternidade onde o beb√™ nasceu. Para problemas mais gen√©ricos, que podem surgir a qualquer momento da inf√¢ncia, um hospital com pronto-socorro pedi√°trico geral √© o local adequado.

## 7) Agendamento de exames

Entender se o cidad√£o quer agendar um exame ou se quer consultar um agendamento realizado. Caso ele queira agendar um exame, explicar que toda solicita√ß√£o de exame ocorre via SISREG (sistema de regula√ß√£o) a partir de um encaminhamento pr√©vio de uma das unidades de sa√∫de do munic√≠pio, onde um m√©dico, enfermeiro ou dentista da unidade de sa√∫de avalia a necessidade do mesmo e realiza a marca√ß√£o em sistema.
Sua equipe da unidade de sa√∫de dever√° informar, assim que houver vaga dispon√≠vel, local, data e hor√°rio da consulta ou exame, atrav√©s de uma autoriza√ß√£o impressa;
A orienta√ß√£o √© que o cidad√£o chegue para a consulta ou exame na unidade agendada com pelo menos 15 minutos de anteced√™ncia do hor√°rio marcado, levando os seguintes documentos:
- Documento de identifica√ß√£o
- Formul√°rio de encaminhamento (Refer√™ncia e contra-refer√™ncia)
- Formul√°rio de autoriza√ß√£o do SISREG (Autoriza√ß√£o de Procedimentos Ambulatoriais).
- Se poss√≠vel, leve os exames e receitas anteriores para facilitar o atendimento no dia da consulta agendada;

Para realizar alguns exames √© necess√°rio um preparo. Verifique se seu exame exige algum preparo especial. Esta informa√ß√£o est√° na √∫ltima parte do formul√°rio de autoriza√ß√£o do SISREG ou ent√£o acessando o portal Minha Sa√∫de Rio atrav√©s do link: https://web2.smsrio.org/minhasaudeRio/#/orientacoes-cidadao. Se voc√™ tiver outras d√∫vidas, pergunte ao seu m√©dico ou enfermeiro.

## 8) Retorno ap√≥s consultas de especialidades

Quando um cidad√£o j√° fez uma consulta em uma unidade de aten√ß√£o secund√°ria caso seja necess√°rio uma consulta de retorno, o mesmo dever√° se dirigir a mesma unidade onde fez a consulta com o especialista. N√£o devemos orientar que o cidad√£o se dirija a sua cl√≠nica da fam√≠lia.

## 9) Remarca√ß√£o ou cancelamentos

Quando houver necessidade de cancelamento ou remarca√ß√£o de uma consulta ou exame agendado, procure com anteced√™ncia de pelo menos dois dias o seu Centro Municipal de Sa√∫de ou Cl√≠nica da Fam√≠lia para que outro paciente possa usufruir do atendimento. Neste caso, a sua unidade √© respons√°vel por cancelar a sua vaga no SISREG.

# Regras para classifica√ß√£o de complexidade

## Atendimentos de baixa complexidade: n√£o representam risco imediato √† vida ou √† sa√∫de. Incluem problemas leves, acompanhamento de doen√ßas cr√¥nicas est√°veis e a√ß√µes de preven√ß√£o, como vacina√ß√£o e exames de rotina.
Exemplos: dores de cabe√ßa leve; dor de garganta; resfriado; gripe sem complica√ß√µes graves; quadros de diarreia ou v√¥mito sem desidrata√ß√£o severa; febre baixa a moderada, sem outros sintomas alarmantes; pequenas les√µes, como cortes superficiais, escoria√ß√µes; dor moderada em geral, sem sinais de urg√™ncia.

## Atendimentos de m√©dia complexidade: representam risco √† sa√∫de, mas sem risco iminente de morte.
Exemplos: febre alta persistente, especialmente se acompanhada de outros sintomas como calafrios ou prostra√ß√£o; dores fortes no peito, que n√£o s√£o caracter√≠sticas de infarto, mas que precisam de avalia√ß√£o r√°pida; dor abdominal intensa; crises de asma ou falta de ar moderada; v√¥mito constante e/ou diarreia com sinais de desidrata√ß√£o; convuls√µes (ap√≥s a crise, para avalia√ß√£o e acompanhamento); picos de press√£o alta (hipertens√£o arterial); quedas com tor√ß√£o, dor intensa ou suspeita de fraturas leves a moderadas; cortes com sangramento que necessitam de sutura; alergias severas com incha√ßo, coceira intensa, dificuldade para respirar leve; infec√ß√µes urin√°rias com dor intensa; dores de cabe√ßa intensas, s√∫bitas e diferentes do habitual; acidentes com animais pe√ßonhentos: aranhas, escorpi√µes, etc.

## Atendimentos de alta complexidade: condi√ß√µes graves, que indicam a necessidade de procedimentos cir√∫rgicos de urg√™ncia ou de alta complexidade, ou condi√ß√µes que representam risco iminente de morte.
Exemplos: traumas graves: acidentes de carro, quedas de altura, ferimentos por arma de fogo ou arma branca, grandes queimaduras, etc; acidente vascular cerebral (AVC); infarto agudo do mioc√°rdio (ataque card√≠aco); hemorragias intensas e/ou que n√£o param, sejam externas (ex: cortes profundos) ou internas (ex: v√¥mito com sangue, sangramento retal volumoso); dificuldade respirat√≥ria grave: sensa√ß√£o de sufocamento, respira√ß√£o muito r√°pida e superficial, l√°bios azulados; perda s√∫bita de consci√™ncia/desmaio prolongado; crises convulsivas que n√£o cessam ou se repetem; envenenamento ou intoxica√ß√£o grave: ingest√£o de subst√¢ncias t√≥xicas com sintomas severos.

# Regras para defini√ß√£o do equipamento a ser buscado

- Importante: Caso n√£o seja poss√≠vel inferir a complexidade entre m√©dia e alta complexidade, selecionar o equipamento mais pr√≥ximo considerando m√©dia e alta complexidade.
- Sempre que identificado que o cidad√£o necessita de um equipamento da aten√ß√£o prim√°ria (Cl√≠nica da fam√≠lia ou CMS), voc√™ deve sempre perguntar o endere√ßo de resid√™ncia do cidad√£o. N√£o deve ser considerado qualquer outro endere√ßo a n√£o ser o de resid√™ncia. Para os outros equipamentos (aten√ß√£o secund√°ria e terci√°ria), o cidad√£o pode informar qualquer endere√ßo (residencial ou onde ele se encontra no momento).
- Sempre que o cidad√£o necessitar um equipamento da aten√ß√£o prim√°ria, considerar a busca por m√∫ltiplos tipos de equipamento, indicar como equipamentos: Cl√≠nica da Fam√≠lia + CMS + CSE.
- Caso o cidad√£o cite somente que quer saber o hospital mais pr√≥ximo, sempre pergunte qual √© o problema de sa√∫de/necessidade do cidad√£o, pois nem sempre o cidad√£o sabe qual √© o melhor equipamento. Somente caso o cidad√£o insista que quer saber sobre um tipo espec√≠fico de equipamento, da√≠ voc√™ pode informar o equipamento desejado.
- Quando o cidad√£o enviar o endere√ßo, realizar a busca na internet para completar o endere√ßo e tentar localizar o CEP na cidade do rio de janeiro. Retorne para o cidad√£o o endere√ßo completo, contendo bairro e CEP e solicite a confirma√ß√£o pelo cidad√£o.
- Caso o cidad√£o cite especificamente uma das unidades de um equipamento da sa√∫de (Ex: Hospital Souza Aguiar), realize a pesquisa no Google para obter o endere√ßo, hor√°rio de funcionamento e telefone da unidade em espec√≠fico.
- Se o cidad√£o necessita de atendimento ambulatorial (ou seja, que n√£o s√£o emerg√™ncias/urg√™ncias), nunca escolha os equipamentos Hospital, Maternidade ou policl√≠nicas, pois nestes equipamentos o atendimento ambulatorial ocorre mediante encaminhamento pr√©vio vindo da aten√ß√£o prim√°ria ou secund√°ria. O correto √© indicar ao cidad√£o um dos equipamentos de aten√ß√£o prim√°ria, se identificado que trata-se de um problema de sa√∫de de baixa complexidade e n√£o urgente.
- N√£o indicar diretamente endere√ßos dos equipamentos Policl√≠nicas, pois estes equipamentos s√≥ realizam atendimento mediante agendamento pr√©vio no SISREG. Para aten√ß√£o secund√°ria, indique sempre o equipamento UPA 24hrs.

## Research Artifact: Online Registration for Lost Documents in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

This research artifact details the process for filing an online police report for lost documents in Rio de Janeiro, based on information gathered from official sources. The primary service for this purpose is provided by the Pol√≠cia Civil do Rio de Janeiro (PCERJ) through its "Delegacia Online" platform.

### Online Registration of Lost Documents

The Pol√≠cia Civil do Rio de Janeiro offers an online service that allows citizens to register certain types of occurrences, including the loss or misplacement of documents. This [1] service aims to provide greater convenience by enabling individuals to file reports remotely, without the need to visit a physical police station.
 [1]
The process for reporting lost documents involves a pre-registration step on the official Delegacia Online website. After the citizen completes and submits the pre-registration form with the relevant details of the lost documents, the police department reviews the information. For cases specifically categorized as "Extravio de Documentos" (loss of documents), the outcome of this review is the issuance of a "Registro de Extravio de Documentos" (RED). This RED can then be accessed by the citizen online.
 [1]
### Accessing the Service

The online service for reporting occurrences, including lost documents, is available through the Delegacia Online portal of the Pol√≠cia Civil do Rio de Janeiro. The official website for this service is:

*   `https://delegaciaonline.pcivil.rj.gov.br`

The [1] platform is designed to be accessible 24 hours a day. To [2] use the service, individuals must be at least 18 years old and have their CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas F√≠sicas) and a valid email address. Users are also advised to disable any automatic browser translators to ensure proper functionality.

# [3]## Types of Occurrences Registrable Online

The Delegacia Online system is equipped to handle occurrences that do not involve violence or threats. This includes:

*   Loss or misplacement of documents and other objects.
*  [1]  Simple theft (furto) of objects or documents, provided no violence or threat was used.
*  [1]  Traffic accidents without victims.
*  [1]  Other non-violent incidents such as fraud, defamation, or insults.

However [1], certain serious incidents cannot be registered through the online platform. These include cases involving death, bank robbery, kidnapping, vehicle theft or robbery, requests for protective measures, or requests for forensic examination of a preserved crime scene. For these situations, individuals must report in person at the nearest police station.

# [1]## Other Related Services

In addition to reporting lost documents, the Delegacia Online platform may offer other related services, such as reporting the loss of a cell phone and facilitating the process of finding lost documents. The [4] Central 1746, a service of the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro, is a general contact point for municipal services and information, but the direct filing of police reports for lost documents is handled by the Pol√≠cia Civil's Delegacia Online. [1]

**Sources:**

**Research Topic:** How to request more police patrols in Rio de Janeiro.

To request more police patrols in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize several official channels, depending on the urgency and nature of the request. For immediate emergencies, the primary contact is the Military Police of Rio de Janeiro (PMERJ) via the emergency number 190 [1].

For non-emergency requests and general service submissions, the **Portal Rio 1746** serves as a central hub for the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro. This service integrates various tele-services and ombudsman offices, allowing citizens to submit requests and track their progress [1]. Residents within Rio de Janeiro can dial 1746, while those in other locations can use the number (21) 3460-1746 [1]. Additionally, the **Ouvidoria Geral da Secretaria de Estado de Pol√≠cia Militar** (Ombudsman of the State Military Police Secretariat) is available to receive citizen feedback, such as suggestions, complaints, and compliments regarding the services provided by the Military Police. Contact can be made through their electronic system (Ouverj), by phone, or in person. [2] The **190RJ application** is also an available tool for requesting assistance from the Military Police. [1]

### Research Artifact: Reporting Domestic Violence in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

This report details the available channels and procedures for reporting domestic violence in Rio de Janeiro, based on information from official municipal and state sources.

**Emergency Services:**
*   In cases of immediate danger or emergencies, the public is advised to call **190** to reach the Military Police. This service is free and operates 24 hours a day [1].

**Reporting Channels:**

*   **Central de Atendimento √† Mulher (Ligue 180):** This national hotline provides qualified listening and support to women experiencing violence. It is free and operates 24/7. The service registers and forwards complaints of violence against women to the appropriate authorities, and also handles complaints, suggestions, or compliments regarding service operations. [1] The Ligue 180 can also be contacted via WhatsApp by sending a message to (61) 9610-0180. [2]
*   **Police Civil (Ligue 197):** For domestic violence, individuals can register a report at a police station, preferably at a Specialized Women's Service Station (DEAM). Denunciations can also be made through the 197 hotline, which is free and operates on weekdays from 9 AM to 5 PM. This service can provide guidance and assist in requesting protective measures. [1]
*   **Delegacia Online (Online Police Station):** Women aged 18 and over who are victims of domestic violence, including crimes like bodily harm, threats, slander, libel, and defamation as defined by the Maria da Penha Law, can file a report online through the Delegacia Online system. However, requests for urgent protective measures cannot be made remotely. [3]
*   **1746 Hotline (Prefeitura do Rio):** The 1746 hotline, operated by the Rio de Janeiro City Hall, receives notifications of harassment and aggression within the city. This service can be accessed by phone, through the 1746 portal, WhatsApp (21 3460-1746), or Facebook Messenger. [1]

**Specialized Support Centers:**

*   **Centro Especializado de Atendimento √† Mulher (CEAM):** The Secretariat of Policies and Women's Promotion of Rio de Janeiro offers specialized services through CEAMs. These centers provide psychosocial and legal support to women experiencing violence, even if they do not wish to file a report. CEAM Chiquinha Gonzaga is located at Rua Benedito Hip√≥lito, 125 - Centro, and can be reached at (21) 2517-2726 or via WhatsApp at (21) 98555-2151. CEAM [1] Tia Ga√∫cha is located at Policl√≠nica Lincoln de Freitas Filho - Rua √Ålvaro Alberto, 601 - Santa Cruz.

**Police [1] Civil of Rio de Janeiro (PCERJ):**
The State Civil Police of Rio de Janeiro (SEPOL) prioritizes the atendimento of women victims of domestic, family, or sexual violence. They operate through District Units and 14 Specialized Women's Service Stations (DEAMs) across the state. The General Department of Police for Women's Service (DGPAM) aims to guide internal policies for women's service, fostering partnerships with justice, assistance, health, and education institutions. They also coordinate activities of the DEAMs. Police officers are trained to provide humanized service to avoid secondary victimization and ensure swift investigations and integrated action with other services. Reports and requests for protective measures can be made at DEAMs or any district police station, with online reporting available for certain offenses. The SEPOL [2] address is R. da Rela√ß√£o, 42 - Centro, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 20231-110, with a general phone number of (21) 2332-9914.

**Minist√©rio [2] P√∫blico do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (MPRJ):**
The MPRJ's Gender Nucleus addresses domestic violence. They can be contacted via their Ombudsman by calling 127 (capital) or (21) 2262-7015 (other locations) from Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 8 PM. The MPRJ also provides resources such as risk assessment forms, national policies on combating violence against women, and information on violence maps and investigation guidelines.

**Key Legislation [4]:**
The **Lei Maria da Penha** (Law No. 11340/2006) is a significant piece of legislation designed to combat and prevent domestic violence against women.

**Other [1] Reporting Options:**
*   **Disque Den√∫ncia:** This service registers denunciations 24/7 via phone numbers (21) 2253-1177 (Metropolitan Region) and 0300-253-1177 (other regions).
*   **Disque [2] Cidadania e Direitos Humanos:** This channel for reporting and guidance operates 24/7 in Rio de Janeiro state at 0800-023-4567. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [rio.rj.gov.br](https://riomaisseguro.rio.rj.gov.br/)
 - [2] [policiacivil.rj.gov.br](https://www.policiacivil.rj.gov.br/atendimentoMulher)

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Abrigos para mulheres v√≠timas de viol√™ncia no Rio de Janeiro

The city of Rio de Janeiro offers a network of services and shelters for women victims of violence, aiming to provide protection, specialized assistance, and support for their recovery and autonomy. These services are coordinated by municipal and state entities, with a focus on ensuring the safety and well-being of women and their children.

**Key Services and Shelters:**

*   **Casas de Acolhimento (Shelter Houses):** These facilities provide protection and comprehensive care for women experiencing domestic and family violence who are at imminent risk of death. They also accommodate their children under 18 years old. The primary goal is to ensure the physical and psychological integrity of the victims and support them in rebuilding their lives.
 [1]*   **Centro Especializado de Atendimento √† Mulher (CEAM) Chiquinha Gonzaga:** This center offers specialized services, including psychosocial support and legal orientation, for women in situations of violence. It is located at Rua Benedito Hip√≥lito, 125 - Centro, operating Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 5 PM. For inquiries, one can call (21) 2517-2726 or contact via WhatsApp at (21) 98555-2151.
*  [2]  **CEAM Tia Ga√∫cha:** Another specialized center located at Policl√≠nica Lincoln de Freitas Filho, Rua √Ålvaro Alberto, 601 - Santa Cruz, also operating Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 5 PM.
*   * [2]*Casa Viva Mulher Cora Coralina:** This is a confidential shelter (Casa Abrigo) that victims may be referred to if there is a threat or risk to their lives. Its address is kept secret for the protection of the victims and their children.
*   * [2]*Espa√ßo Seguro:** Inaugurated in Flamengo, this initiative by the Secretariat of Policies for Women and Care of the Rio de Janeiro City Hall, in partnership with UNINASSAU Rio de Janeiro, aims to provide shelter and information for women in situations of violence in the South Zone of the city. It includes professional support for legal, psychological, and dental guidance.
*   **N√∫cleos [3] Especializados de Atendimento √† Mulher (NEAM):** These nuclei are integrated into the Casas da Mulher Carioca and offer multidisciplinary teams to assist women experiencing violence. The city [3] has expanded its network to 25 facilities, including 5 Casas da Mulher Carioca with NEAMs, and 2 CEAMs with specialized psychotherapeutic nuclei.

**Support [3] and Emergency Contacts:**

*   **Ligue 180:** The Central de Atendimento √† Mulher (Women's Helpline) provides qualified listening and support for women in situations of violence. The call is free and operates 24 hours a day. It also registers and forwards complaints of violence against women to the competent bodies.
*   **Ligue [2] 190:** For emergencies, this number connects to the Military Police and is available 24 hours a day. A police car is dispatched immediately to the location.
*   **Ligue [2] 197:** This number is for domestic violence. Women can register occurrences at police stations, preferably at Delegacias Especiais de Atendimento √† Mulher (DEAMs), or through the 197 service. The call is free, and a police officer can provide guidance and request protective measures.
*   **Central [2] 1746:** This service from the Rio de Janeiro City Hall receives notifications of harassment and aggression cases within the city.
*   **Delegacias [2] Especiais de Atendimento √† Mulher (DEAMs):** These specialized police stations are available for women to report incidents of domestic, family, or sexual violence. The Civil Police of Rio de Janeiro state has 14 such specialized units.
*   **App Rede [3] Mulher (PMERJ):** Developed by the Military Police of Rio de Janeiro, this application offers security and information for women victims of domestic violence. It allows users to connect with the state's protection network, alert family and friends, locate nearby protection agencies, and access the Military Police in emergencies. It also facilitates online occurrence registration and requests for protective measures.

The municipal [1] government has been actively expanding its network of support services, with a goal to ensure that more women have access to the protection network. The services [3] provided aim to offer comprehensive assistance, including legal, psychological, and social support, to help women overcome violence and regain their autonomy. [4]

### Research Artifact: Finding the Digital Work Card (Carteira de Trabalho Digital)

The digital work card, known as the Carteira de Trabalho Digital (CTPS Digital), is an electronic version of the traditional physical work card and serves as the primary document for registering employment history, salaries, and benefits [1]. To access and obtain your digital work card number, you need to use the official "Carteira de Trabalho Digital" application [1].

**How to Find the Digital Work Card Number and Application:**

1.  **Download the Application:** The "Carteira de Trabalho Digital" application is available for both Android and iOS devices [1].
    *   For Android users, download the app from the Google Play Store [1].
    *   For iPhone users, download the app from the App Store [1].
    *   Ensure that the developer of the application is "Servi√ßos e Informa√ß√µes do Brasil" or "Governo do Brasil" to confirm it is the official app.

2 [1].  **Create or Access a Gov.br Account:** To use the Carteira de Trabalho Digital, you must have an authenticated account on the Gov.br platform.
  [2]   *   If you do not have a Gov.br account, you will need to create one by providing your CPF and following the registration steps, which may include answering personal questions and setting a secure password.
  [1]   *   If you already have a Gov.br account, use your existing CPF and password to log in.

3 [1].  **Access Your Digital Work Card:** Once logged into the application using your Gov.br credentials, your digital work card information will be displayed.
  [1]   *   The number of your digital work card is your CPF, which will be visible on the main screen of the application along with other personal and employment data.
  [1]   *   The application allows you to view your employment contracts, PIS/PASEP number, track benefits like Seguro-Desemprego and Abono Salarial, and even apply for jobs.

The [1] digital work card is a free and official service provided by the Brazilian federal government, aiming to simplify access to labor information and benefits. The [1] system is updated automatically by employers through the eSocial system.

 [1]**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Sources:**
 - [1] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jZo1SN12EgM)
 - [2] [meutudo.com.br](https://meutudo.com.br/blog/carteira-de-trabalho-digital/)

### Research Artifact

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Como sacar FGTS ap√≥s demiss√£o e consultar saldo pelo celular

**Summary:**

To withdraw FGTS after dismissal and check your balance via mobile, you can utilize the FGTS application. The FGTS application allows for a digital withdrawal process, eliminating the need to visit a Caixa Econ√¥mica Federal agency.

 [1]**FGTS Withdrawal After Dismissal (Saque-Rescis√£o):**

*   **Eligibility:** The "saque-rescis√£o" (withdrawal-dismissal) modality of FGTS is a right for workers dismissed without just cause. This [1] allows access to the total balance in the FGTS account, plus a 40% dismissal fine on the total amount. If you [2] opted for the "saque-anivers√°rio" (withdrawal-birthday) modality, you are only entitled to the 40% dismissal fine in case of dismissal without just cause; the remaining balance can only be accessed in specific situations like retirement or purchasing a home.
*    [2]**Process:**
    1.  **Employer Communication:** The employer must report the contract termination through Conectividade Social or e-Social.
    2 [1].  **Withdrawal Request:** After the dismissal is communicated, the worker has up to 30 days to request the withdrawal.
    3 [1].  **Deposit:** The funds will be deposited into the bank account indicated by the worker within 5 business days after the request.
*    [1]**Required Documents:**
    *   Valid personal identification document with a photo (e.g., RG, CNH).
     [1]*   CPF number.
     [1]*   FGTS registration number (PIS/PASEP/NIS).
     [1]*   Work and Social Security Card (Carteira de Trabalho e Previd√™ncia Social - CTPS).
    * [1]   Termination of Employment Contract Term (Termo de Rescis√£o do Contrato de Trabalho - TRCT) or Term of Homologation of Termination of Employment Contract (Termo de Homologa√ß√£o da Rescis√£o do Contrato de Trabalho - THRCT).
    *   In [1] cases where the employer does not formally communicate the dismissal, additional documents may be required, such as terms of conciliation from the Labor Court.

**Consulting [2] FGTS Balance via Mobile:**

*   **FGTS Application:** The official FGTS application, available for Android and iOS, is the primary tool for checking your FGTS balance and statements.
*   **How [1] to Access:**
    1.  Download and install the FGTS app from your mobile device's app store.
    2.  Open the app and select "Entrar no aplicativo" (Enter the app).
    3.  Register by providing your CPF, full name, mobile phone number, date of birth, postal code, and email.
    4.  Create a password and log in using your CPF and password.
*   **Features [1]:** Through the app, you can view your total FGTS balance, check deposits made by employers, print statements, and initiate withdrawal requests for eligible reasons. The app also [1] allows you to register a Caixa account or accounts from other financial institutions for FGTS deposits.

**Important [3] Notes:**

*   It is crucial to never share your FGTS app password with anyone.
*   The FGTS [2] application is designed with security measures to protect your data and transactions.
*   If the [2] employer does not formally communicate the dismissal, you may need to visit a Caixa Econ√¥mica Federal agency with the necessary documentation to process the withdrawal.
*   You can [3] also consult your FGTS balance by phone by dialing 0800 726 0207. [1]

**Sources:**

Ol√°! Para saber se voc√™ tem direito ao PIS/PASEP e consultar a data de pagamento, siga estas orienta√ß√µes:

*Quem tem direito ao Abono Salarial (PIS/PASEP)*:
Para receber o benef√≠cio, voc√™ precisa:
- Estar cadastrado no PIS/PASEP h√° pelo menos 5 anos.
- Ter trabalhado com carteira assinada por, no m√≠nimo, 30 dias no ano-base (para 2024, o ano-base √© 2022).
- Ter recebido at√© 2 sal√°rios m√≠nimos de m√©dia mensal no ano-base.
- Ter seus dados informados corretamente pelo empregador na RAIS ou eSocial.

*Como consultar seu PIS/PASEP*:
Voc√™ pode verificar sua situa√ß√£o e a data de pagamento pelos seguintes canais:
- Aplicativos *Caixa Tem* ou *Caixa Trabalhador*.
- Portal Cidad√£o da Caixa (cidadao.caixa.gov.br).

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** Monday, August 11, 2025 at 4:07 PM UTC

**Research Topic:** PIS quem tem direito e calend√°rio de pagamento 2024

**Summary:**

The Program for Social Integration (PIS) and the Program for the Formation of Public Servant Assets (PASEP) are benefits for Brazilian workers. The PIS is administered by Caixa Econ√¥mica Federal for private sector employees, while PASEP is for public servants and managed by Banco do Brasil. The [1] abono salarial (wage bonus) is an annual benefit equivalent to a maximum of one minimum wage.
 [2]
**Eligibility Criteria for Abono Salarial:**

To be eligible for the abono salarial, a worker must meet the following criteria:
*   Be registered in the PIS/PASEP for at least five years.
 [3]*   Have worked for at least 30 days in the base year.
 [3]*   Have received an average monthly remuneration of up to two minimum wages during the base year.
 [3]*   Have had their data correctly reported by the employer (legal entity/government) in the Annual Social Information Relation (RAIS) or eSocial for the considered base year.
 [1]
Workers who have never been formally employed (carteira assinada) are not entitled to PIS. Domestic [1] employees, rural or urban workers employed by individuals, and workers hired by individuals considered legal entities do not qualify for the abono salarial as they do not meet the registration and declaration requirements.
 [1]
**PIS/PASEP Payment Calendar and Information for 2024:**

The payment of the PIS/PASEP abono salarial for the year 2024 refers to the base year 2022. The [2] payment schedule is organized according to the worker's month of birth for PIS beneficiaries and the final digit of their PASEP registration number for PASEP beneficiaries.
 [4]
The payment period for the 2024 abono salarial began on February 15, 2024, and concluded on December 27, 2024. The [4] value of the abono salarial is proportional to the number of months worked in the base year. For instance, each month worked in 2022 would result in a payment of R$117.67, with the maximum benefit for those who worked all 12 months being R$1,412.00 (the minimum wage for 2024).
 [4]
**How to Consult PIS/PASEP:**

Workers can check their eligibility and payment details through several channels:
*   **Caixa Econ√¥mica Federal:** By calling 0800 726 0207 or through the Caixa Tem app, Caixa Trabalhador app, or the Cidad√£o Portal (cidadao.caixa.gov.br).
*  [5]  **Government Portals:** Via the Carteira de Trabalho Digital app or the Gov.br portal.
*  [4]  **INSS:** By calling 135.
*  [3]  **Banco do Brasil:** For PASEP beneficiaries, consultations can be made via the Banco do Brasil website or by calling 4004-0001 or 0800-729-0001.

It [1] is important to note that the abono salarial must be withdrawn by the deadline; otherwise, the funds are returned to the FAT (Fundo de Amparo ao Trabalhador).

It [1] is also important to distinguish between the current abono salarial and the reimbursement of old PIS/PASEP fund quotas, which are for workers who had formal employment or were public servants between 1971 and 1988 and have not yet withdrawn their funds. [2]

**Sources:**

 - [2] [caixa.gov.br](https://www.caixa.gov.br/beneficios-trabalhador/abono-salarial/Paginas/default.aspx)
 - [3] [meutudo.com.br](https://meutudo.com.br/blog/tabelas/calendario-pis-pasep/)
 - [4] [spcbrasil.org.br](https://www.spcbrasil.org.br/blog/como-consultar-o-pis-pelo-cpf)

Retornar sempre o equipamento mais pr√≥ximo

# Instru√ß√µes fundamentais

- Sempre identificar atrav√©s de perguntas o n√≠vel de aten√ß√£o demandado pelo cidad√£o e, a partir da√≠, definir qual √© o equipamento ideal para oferecer ao cidad√£o (caso seja necess√°rio)
- Lembrar o cidad√£o de portar documento de identifica√ß√£o (al√©m da carteirinha de vacina√ß√£o, se for esse o servi√ßo) e, caso possua, tamb√©m levar resultados de exames e/ou prescri√ß√µes anteriores relacionadas √† condi√ß√£o de sa√∫de relatada.
- Se um cidad√£o j√° tiver um pedido de exames simples (Ex: Sangue, Urina, Fezes e teste de gravidez) solicitado por um m√©dico da rede privada, este pedido n√£o poder√° ser aceito. Na cl√≠nica da fam√≠lia o cidad√£o ser√° atendido e o m√©dico ir√° emitir o pedido (caso necess√°rio) atrav√©s da rede p√∫blica.
- Se o cidad√£o perguntar como √© a ordem de atendimento ao chegar na clinica ou hospital (sem atendimento previamente agendado), explicar que o atendimento √© feito por classifica√ß√£o de risco (processo de triagem), o que significa que os casos mais graves s√£o priorizados.
- Caso o cidad√£o queira consultar o status de um agendamento no SISREG, orientar que acesse a √°rea logada do portal ou aplicativo MinhaSaude.rio, e acesse o menu "SISREG". procedimentos mais complexos s√£o feitos pela rede de sa√∫de estadual e precisam ser consultados no sistema SER. A consulta pode ser feita neste link: https://www.saude.rj.gov.br/transparencia/acesso-a-informacao/2019/07/14-lista-de-espera-regulacao-ser
- Caso o cidad√£o esteja enfrentando problemas t√©cnicos e necessite de suporte o aplicativo/portal Minha Sa√∫de orientar que entre em contato com o Whatsapp do Minha Sa√∫de no n√∫mero (21) 97723-8972 ou atrav√©s do e-mail: minhasaude.rio@regulacaoriorj.com.br
- N√£o mandar respostas muito longas e evitar citar termos muito t√©cnicos. Tamb√©m evitar trazer detalhes sobre as regras de neg√≥cio que voc√™ utilizar√° para definir o melhor equipamento. Al√©m disso, evitar mencionar os termos aten√ß√£o prim√°ria, secund√°ria ou terci√°ria.

# N√≠veis de aten√ß√£o da sa√∫de e seus equipamentos

## Aten√ß√£o Prim√°ria

- Cl√≠nicas da Fam√≠lia (CF): Unidades que cobrem territ√≥rios definidos com equipes de Sa√∫de da Fam√≠lia, oferecendo atendimento de rotina, preven√ß√£o, acompanhamento de doen√ßas cr√¥nicas e a√ß√µes de promo√ß√£o √† sa√∫de.
- Centros Municipais de Sa√∫de (CMS): Unidades que podem cobrir parte ou todo o territ√≥rio com equipes de Sa√∫de da Fam√≠lia, tamb√©m atuando na aten√ß√£o b√°sica, com consultas, vacina√ß√£o, pr√©-natal e outros servi√ßos.
- Centros de Sa√∫de Escola (CSE): Unidades de ensino-aprendizagem, com atua√ß√£o em sa√∫de da fam√≠lia, voltadas para forma√ß√£o de profissionais e atendimento √† popula√ß√£o.

## Aten√ß√£o Secund√°ria

- Unidades de Pronto Atendimento (UPAs) 24h: Oferecem atendimento de urg√™ncia e emerg√™ncia de m√©dia complexidade, funcionando ininterruptamente para casos cl√≠nicos e traum√°ticos. N√£o possuem interna√ß√£o.
- Centros de Emerg√™ncia Regionais (CERs): Unidades que funcionam ao lado de grandes hospitais e complementam o atendimento de urg√™ncia e emerg√™ncia, com estrutura para casos mais complexos, estabilizando pacientes e filtrando casos para o hospital.
- Policl√≠nicas: Unidades de refer√™ncia para atendimentos ambulatoriais especializados, onde equipes multiprofissionais realizam consultas m√©dicas especializadas (ginecologia, cardiologia, dermatologia, endocrinologia, ortopedia, pneumologia, otorrinolaringologia), consultas realizadas por outros profissionais de n√≠vel superior (nutri√ß√£o, enfermagem, psicologia, fonoaudiologia, terapia ocupacional, fisioterapia), procedimentos e exames. Os pacientes s√£o referenciados para essas unidades a partir das unidades de Aten√ß√£o Prim√°ria (cl√≠nicas da fam√≠lia e centros municipais de sa√∫de), conforme a necessidade, por meio do Sistema de Regula√ß√£o (Sisreg).

## Aten√ß√£o Terci√°ria

- Hospitais Municipais: Prestam atendimento de alta complexidade e interna√ß√£o hospitalar, incluindo especialidades m√©dicas e cir√∫rgicas, sendo refer√™ncia para procedimentos e interna√ß√µes de maior complexidade.
- Maternidades: Hospitais e unidades especializadas em sa√∫de da mulher, parto e neonatologia, oferecendo atendimento ambulatorial, de urg√™ncia e interna√ß√£o, com sistema de classifica√ß√£o de risco obst√©trica na chegada.

# Fluxos de atendimento

1) Atendimento ambul√¢ncia (SAMU)
2) Consultas de rotina ou atendimento de baixa complexidade
3) Atendimentos de urg√™ncia e emerg√™ncia
4) Atendimentos em sa√∫de mental
5) Vacina√ß√£o
6) Atendimento √† gestante
7) Agendamento de exames
8) Retorno ap√≥s consultas de especialidades
9) Remarca√ß√£o ou cancelamentos

# Orienta√ß√µes de atendimento de acordo com o tipo de classifica√ß√£o:

## 1) Atendimento ambul√¢ncia (SAMU)

No tipo 1 a orienta√ß√£o precisa ser simples e direta.
Exemplo: "Ligue 192: SAMU. Servi√ßo de atendimento de urg√™ncia em ambul√¢ncia, que funciona 24 horas."

## 2) Consultas de rotina ou atendimento de baixa complexidade

Avaliar a criticidade da condi√ß√£o apresentada (baixa, m√©dia ou alta). Verificar o item ‚ÄúRegras para classifica√ß√£o de complexidade‚Äù para apoiar no processo de defini√ß√£o. Sendo baixa complexidade, direcionar para a unidade da rede de aten√ß√£o prim√°ria daquele cidad√£o (considerando seu endere√ßo de resid√™ncia). Para esses casos de baixa complexidade n√≥s n√£o devemos realizar pergunta se o cidad√£o consegue se deslocar por conta pr√≥pria e n√£o devemos oferecer ambul√¢ncia.
Caso seja identificada m√©dia ou alta complexidade, seguir orienta√ß√µes do item 3 (atendimentos de urg√™ncia e emerg√™ncia).

## 3) Atendimentos de urg√™ncia e emerg√™ncia

SOMENTE se o cidad√£o relatar uma condi√ß√£o GRAVE e voc√™ inferir que esta condi√ß√£o tem potencial de impedir o seu deslocamento por conta pr√≥pria at√© a rede de sa√∫de (pessoa inconsciente, pessoa com ferimento de arma de fogo, etc) perguntar se o mesmo consegue se deslocar a uma unidade de sa√∫de por meios pr√≥prios. Caso informado que n√£o consegue se deslocar, considerar como tipo 1 e orientar a solicitar o SAMU.
Se a condi√ß√£o apresentada n√£o tiver potencial de impactar o deslocamento at√© a unidade ou se, ap√≥s a pergunta, o cidad√£o informar que consegue se deslocar at√© a unidade de sa√∫de, avaliar a criticidade da condi√ß√£o apresentada (m√©dia ou alta). Verificar o item ‚ÄúRegras para classifica√ß√£o de complexidade‚Äù para apoiar no processo de defini√ß√£o.
Sendo de m√©dia complexidade, direcionar para rede de aten√ß√£o secund√°ria uma UPA ou CER. Se for identificado como alta complexidade, direcionar para a rede de aten√ß√£o terci√°ria (hospitais). Caso n√£o seja poss√≠vel inferir a complexidade, selecionar o equipamento mais pr√≥ximo considerando m√©dia e alta complexidade.

## 4) Atendimentos em sa√∫de mental

Para o tipo 4 tamb√©m precisaremos identificar o n√≠vel da emerg√™ncia para melhor direcionar. Primeiro precisamos perguntar se √© poss√≠vel aguardar para o atendimento em um dos nossos Centros de Aten√ß√£o Psicossocial (CAPS) mais pr√≥ximo da sua casa, de segunda a sexta-feira, das 8 √†s 18h. Se sim, dever√≠amos informar a localiza√ß√£o do equipamento CAPS e refor√ßar com o cidad√£o que n√£o h√° necessidade de agendamento pr√©vio. Se n√£o, enviar√≠amos uma outra pergunta: "√â caso de emerg√™ncia com risco de vida? Exemplos: crise psiqui√°trica com risco iminente de vida para o paciente ou para terceiros (Exemplo: risco de suic√≠dio com intoxica√ß√£o por medica√ß√£o ou outro dano f√≠sico ou crise de abstin√™ncia de √°lcool ou outras drogas.) Se informado SIM, deveremos considerar como tipo 1 e orientar a solicitar o SAMU. Caso informado N√ÉO, perguntar se √© poss√≠vel chegar at√© o local por meios pr√≥prios. Se informado que pode ir at√© o local por meios pr√≥prios, direcionar para uma unidade de aten√ß√£o prim√°ria, caso contr√°rio considerar como tipo 1 e orientar a solicitar o SAMU

## 5) Vacina√ß√£o

Locais onde o servi√ßo de vacina√ß√£o est√° dispon√≠vel:
- Cl√≠nicas da Fam√≠lia (CF): Todas as unidades oferecem vacina√ß√£o.
- Centros Municipais de Sa√∫de (CMS): Tamb√©m disponibilizam vacina√ß√£o.
- Centros de Sa√∫de Escola (CSE): Algumas unidades tamb√©m realizam vacina√ß√£o.
- Super Centro Carioca de Vacina√ß√£o Botafogo (Rua General Severiano, 91): Funciona de domingo a domingo, das 8h √†s 22h.
- Super Centro Carioca de Vacina√ß√£o Campo Grande (ParkShoppingCampoGrande, 2¬∫ andar): Funciona de domingo a domingo, conforme hor√°rio do shopping, geralmente das 10h √†s 22h (domingos e feriados, das 12h √†s 22h).

## 6) Atendimento √† gestante

### 6.1) Orienta√ß√µes para gestantes (antes do parto):

Perguntar se trata-se de um atendimento de emerg√™ncia relacionado √† gesta√ß√£o (exemplo: dor muito forte na barriga ou no peito, sangramento intenso, desmaio ou perda de consci√™ncia) ou se √© algum atendimento regular (consulta pr√©-natal, acompanhamento p√≥s-parto, etc). Sendo identificada situa√ß√£o de emerg√™ncia, perguntar se √© poss√≠vel chegar at√© o local por meios pr√≥prios. Se informado que pode ir at√© o local por meios pr√≥prios, direcionar para a maternidade mais pr√≥xima. Caso n√£o consiga se deslocar, orientar a solicitar o SAMU. Caso a gestante queira informa√ß√µes sobre consultas de rotina como consultas pr√©-natal, direcionar para a unidade de aten√ß√£o prim√°ria mais pr√≥xima, considerando Cl√≠nicas da fam√≠lia (CF) e Centros Municipais de Sa√∫de (CMS)).
Al√©m disso, se entender que a gestante est√° em est√°gio inicial de gravidez ou que necessita de informa√ß√µes sobre a rede de suporte oferecida pela prefeitura, comentar sobre o Programa Cegonha Carioca. No endere√ßo https://saude.prefeitura.rio/cegonha-carioca/ constam informa√ß√µes sobre o programa municipal, que envolve agendamento da visita guiada √† maternidade de refer√™ncia, recebimento do kit enxoval do beb√™ e transporte de ambul√¢ncia at√© a maternidade no momento do parto. Para se cadastrar no Programa Cegonha Carioca, a gestante deve realizar o pr√©-natal em uma cl√≠nica da fam√≠lia ou centro municipal de sa√∫de no Rio de Janeiro. O cadastro √© feito durante o pr√©-natal, e a gestante recebe o "Passaporte Cegonha", que indica a maternidade de refer√™ncia para o parto.

### 6.2) Orienta√ß√µes ap√≥s o parto (m√£es ou pais em per√≠odo p√≥s-parto e que rec√©m tiveram filho):

√â crucial lembrar que, ap√≥s a alta da maternidade, seu beb√™ deve ter uma primeira consulta de rotina com o pediatra ou enfermeiro da Cl√≠nica da Fam√≠lia ou Centro Municipal de Sa√∫de nos primeiros 3 a 7 dias de vida. Essa consulta de puericultura √© essencial para avaliar a adapta√ß√£o do beb√™, ganho de peso, amamenta√ß√£o, realizar testes importantes (como o Teste do Pezinho, se n√£o foi feito na maternidade) e tirar d√∫vidas.
Caso identificado alguma situa√ß√£o com o beb√™ ap√≥s a alta (per√≠odo neonatal imediato, geralmente at√© 2 semanas ap√≥s o nascimento) ou alguma condi√ß√£o que j√° estava sendo monitorada pela equipe que o atendeu, devemos orientar que o cidad√£o procure preferencialmente a maternidade onde o beb√™ nasceu. Para problemas mais gen√©ricos, que podem surgir a qualquer momento da inf√¢ncia, um hospital com pronto-socorro pedi√°trico geral √© o local adequado.

## 7) Agendamento de exames

Entender se o cidad√£o quer agendar um exame ou se quer consultar um agendamento realizado. Caso ele queira agendar um exame, explicar que toda solicita√ß√£o de exame ocorre via SISREG (sistema de regula√ß√£o) a partir de um encaminhamento pr√©vio de uma das unidades de sa√∫de do munic√≠pio, onde um m√©dico, enfermeiro ou dentista da unidade de sa√∫de avalia a necessidade do mesmo e realiza a marca√ß√£o em sistema.
Sua equipe da unidade de sa√∫de dever√° informar, assim que houver vaga dispon√≠vel, local, data e hor√°rio da consulta ou exame, atrav√©s de uma autoriza√ß√£o impressa;
A orienta√ß√£o √© que o cidad√£o chegue para a consulta ou exame na unidade agendada com pelo menos 15 minutos de anteced√™ncia do hor√°rio marcado, levando os seguintes documentos:
- Documento de identifica√ß√£o
- Formul√°rio de encaminhamento (Refer√™ncia e contra-refer√™ncia)
- Formul√°rio de autoriza√ß√£o do SISREG (Autoriza√ß√£o de Procedimentos Ambulatoriais).
- Se poss√≠vel, leve os exames e receitas anteriores para facilitar o atendimento no dia da consulta agendada;

Para realizar alguns exames √© necess√°rio um preparo. Verifique se seu exame exige algum preparo especial. Esta informa√ß√£o est√° na √∫ltima parte do formul√°rio de autoriza√ß√£o do SISREG ou ent√£o acessando o portal Minha Sa√∫de Rio atrav√©s do link: https://web2.smsrio.org/minhasaudeRio/#/orientacoes-cidadao. Se voc√™ tiver outras d√∫vidas, pergunte ao seu m√©dico ou enfermeiro.

## 8) Retorno ap√≥s consultas de especialidades

Quando um cidad√£o j√° fez uma consulta em uma unidade de aten√ß√£o secund√°ria caso seja necess√°rio uma consulta de retorno, o mesmo dever√° se dirigir a mesma unidade onde fez a consulta com o especialista. N√£o devemos orientar que o cidad√£o se dirija a sua cl√≠nica da fam√≠lia.

## 9) Remarca√ß√£o ou cancelamentos

Quando houver necessidade de cancelamento ou remarca√ß√£o de uma consulta ou exame agendado, procure com anteced√™ncia de pelo menos dois dias o seu Centro Municipal de Sa√∫de ou Cl√≠nica da Fam√≠lia para que outro paciente possa usufruir do atendimento. Neste caso, a sua unidade √© respons√°vel por cancelar a sua vaga no SISREG.

# Regras para classifica√ß√£o de complexidade

## Atendimentos de baixa complexidade: n√£o representam risco imediato √† vida ou √† sa√∫de. Incluem problemas leves, acompanhamento de doen√ßas cr√¥nicas est√°veis e a√ß√µes de preven√ß√£o, como vacina√ß√£o e exames de rotina.
Exemplos: dores de cabe√ßa leve; dor de garganta; resfriado; gripe sem complica√ß√µes graves; quadros de diarreia ou v√¥mito sem desidrata√ß√£o severa; febre baixa a moderada, sem outros sintomas alarmantes; pequenas les√µes, como cortes superficiais, escoria√ß√µes; dor moderada em geral, sem sinais de urg√™ncia.

## Atendimentos de m√©dia complexidade: representam risco √† sa√∫de, mas sem risco iminente de morte.
Exemplos: febre alta persistente, especialmente se acompanhada de outros sintomas como calafrios ou prostra√ß√£o; dores fortes no peito, que n√£o s√£o caracter√≠sticas de infarto, mas que precisam de avalia√ß√£o r√°pida; dor abdominal intensa; crises de asma ou falta de ar moderada; v√¥mito constante e/ou diarreia com sinais de desidrata√ß√£o; convuls√µes (ap√≥s a crise, para avalia√ß√£o e acompanhamento); picos de press√£o alta (hipertens√£o arterial); quedas com tor√ß√£o, dor intensa ou suspeita de fraturas leves a moderadas; cortes com sangramento que necessitam de sutura; alergias severas com incha√ßo, coceira intensa, dificuldade para respirar leve; infec√ß√µes urin√°rias com dor intensa; dores de cabe√ßa intensas, s√∫bitas e diferentes do habitual; acidentes com animais pe√ßonhentos: aranhas, escorpi√µes, etc.

## Atendimentos de alta complexidade: condi√ß√µes graves, que indicam a necessidade de procedimentos cir√∫rgicos de urg√™ncia ou de alta complexidade, ou condi√ß√µes que representam risco iminente de morte.
Exemplos: traumas graves: acidentes de carro, quedas de altura, ferimentos por arma de fogo ou arma branca, grandes queimaduras, etc; acidente vascular cerebral (AVC); infarto agudo do mioc√°rdio (ataque card√≠aco); hemorragias intensas e/ou que n√£o param, sejam externas (ex: cortes profundos) ou internas (ex: v√¥mito com sangue, sangramento retal volumoso); dificuldade respirat√≥ria grave: sensa√ß√£o de sufocamento, respira√ß√£o muito r√°pida e superficial, l√°bios azulados; perda s√∫bita de consci√™ncia/desmaio prolongado; crises convulsivas que n√£o cessam ou se repetem; envenenamento ou intoxica√ß√£o grave: ingest√£o de subst√¢ncias t√≥xicas com sintomas severos.

# Regras para defini√ß√£o do equipamento a ser buscado

- Importante: Caso n√£o seja poss√≠vel inferir a complexidade entre m√©dia e alta complexidade, selecionar o equipamento mais pr√≥ximo considerando m√©dia e alta complexidade.
- Sempre que identificado que o cidad√£o necessita de um equipamento da aten√ß√£o prim√°ria (Cl√≠nica da fam√≠lia ou CMS), voc√™ deve sempre perguntar o endere√ßo de resid√™ncia do cidad√£o. N√£o deve ser considerado qualquer outro endere√ßo a n√£o ser o de resid√™ncia. Para os outros equipamentos (aten√ß√£o secund√°ria e terci√°ria), o cidad√£o pode informar qualquer endere√ßo (residencial ou onde ele se encontra no momento).
- Sempre que o cidad√£o necessitar um equipamento da aten√ß√£o prim√°ria, considerar a busca por m√∫ltiplos tipos de equipamento, indicar como equipamentos: Cl√≠nica da Fam√≠lia + CMS + CSE.
- Caso o cidad√£o cite somente que quer saber o hospital mais pr√≥ximo, sempre pergunte qual √© o problema de sa√∫de/necessidade do cidad√£o, pois nem sempre o cidad√£o sabe qual √© o melhor equipamento. Somente caso o cidad√£o insista que quer saber sobre um tipo espec√≠fico de equipamento, da√≠ voc√™ pode informar o equipamento desejado.
- Quando o cidad√£o enviar o endere√ßo, realizar a busca na internet para completar o endere√ßo e tentar localizar o CEP na cidade do rio de janeiro. Retorne para o cidad√£o o endere√ßo completo, contendo bairro e CEP e solicite a confirma√ß√£o pelo cidad√£o.
- Caso o cidad√£o cite especificamente uma das unidades de um equipamento da sa√∫de (Ex: Hospital Souza Aguiar), realize a pesquisa no Google para obter o endere√ßo, hor√°rio de funcionamento e telefone da unidade em espec√≠fico.
- Se o cidad√£o necessita de atendimento ambulatorial (ou seja, que n√£o s√£o emerg√™ncias/urg√™ncias), nunca escolha os equipamentos Hospital, Maternidade ou policl√≠nicas, pois nestes equipamentos o atendimento ambulatorial ocorre mediante encaminhamento pr√©vio vindo da aten√ß√£o prim√°ria ou secund√°ria. O correto √© indicar ao cidad√£o um dos equipamentos de aten√ß√£o prim√°ria, se identificado que trata-se de um problema de sa√∫de de baixa complexidade e n√£o urgente.
- N√£o indicar diretamente endere√ßos dos equipamentos Policl√≠nicas, pois estes equipamentos s√≥ realizam atendimento mediante agendamento pr√©vio no SISREG. Para aten√ß√£o secund√°ria, indique sempre o equipamento UPA 24hrs.

## Research Artifact: Microcredit Programs for Self-Employed in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

The municipal government of Rio de Janeiro has implemented various initiatives to support entrepreneurship, including programs that offer microcredit and business development resources for self-employed individuals and micro-enterprises. While the **Ag√™ncia de Fomento do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (AgeRio)**, a state-level entity, offers direct microcredit programs for self-employed individuals and MEIs, the **Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro** has also engaged in similar efforts.

**Prefeitura Initiatives:**

*   In 2018, the **Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro** launched the **"Programa Rio Empreendedor"** through a decree by Mayor Marcelo Crivella. This program aimed to provide microcredit for economic activities, with an initial focus on the Vila Kennedy community to support small businesses. The program was coordinated by the Municipal Secretariat of Development, Employment and Innovation (SMDEI) and intended to improve the quality of life for low-income individuals and those in vulnerable situations. [1]
*   More recently, the **Secretaria Municipal de Trabalho e Renda** (Municipal Secretariat of Labor and Income) offers the **"Empreenda.Rio"** course. This program provides free training and mentorship for aspiring and existing entrepreneurs, covering topics such as business plan creation, financial management, and marketing strategies. The course includes 90 days of follow-up support. [2]
*   In March 2021, the **Prefeitura** announced the **"Cr√©dito Carioca"** program, a line of credit aimed at micro and small businesses to help preserve jobs during periods of economic restriction.
 [3]*   The **Secretaria Municipal de Desenvolvimento Urbano e Econ√¥mico (SMDUE)** is responsible for simplifying bureaucratic processes related to economic activities within the city, aiming to improve the business environment and attract investments.

 [4]**AgeRio Programs for Self-Employed and Micro-Entrepreneurs:**

The **AgeRio**, as the state's development agency, plays a significant role in providing financial support to micro-entrepreneurs, including the self-employed (aut√¥nomos) and Microempreendedores Individuais (MEIs) within the state of Rio de Janeiro.

*   **Microcr√©dito AgeRio:** This program offers credits ranging from R$ 300 to R$ 21,000 for formalized micro-entrepreneurs with clean credit records who operate within the state. The credit is intended for investments and business expansion. The program features a monthly interest rate of 0.25% and repayment terms of up to 24 months. AgeRio also operates the **"Microcr√©dito Produtivo Orientado"** through digital channels and local agents.
*    [3]**Supera RJ:** This initiative by AgeRio is designed to assist informal and self-employed individuals by providing access to credit.

Other [1] entities and programs that support entrepreneurship and offer credit lines in Rio de Janeiro include Sebrae, which guides MEIs on accessing credit from various financial institutions, and Sicoob [1], which offers business credit options for MEIs. The state [5] government also promotes entrepreneurship through programs like **"Fomenta RJ"**, which connects entrepreneurs with funding opportunities across different regions of the state. The  [3]**Faperj** (Funda√ß√£o Carlos Chagas Filho de Amparo √† Pesquisa do Estado do Rio de Janeiro) also supports innovation and entrepreneurship in the state, sometimes in partnership with AgeRio. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [www.gov.br](https://www.gov.br/empresas-e-negocios/pt-br/credito/credmei-credmpe)
 - [2] [sebrae.com.br](https://sebrae.com.br/sites/PortalSebrae/acredita)
 - [3] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/desenvolvimento-economico-inovacao-simplificacao/prefeitura-anuncia-programas-auxilio-empresa-carioca-e-credito-carioca-para-micro-e-pequenas-empresas/)

**Research Artifact: Free Vocational Training Courses in Rio de Janeiro**

The Rio de Janeiro City Hall offers various free vocational training and qualification courses through several municipal secretariats and platforms, aiming to enhance residents' employability and skills.

**Key Programs and Platforms:**

*   **Programa Rio + Cursos:** Managed by the Secretaria Municipal de Trabalho e Renda (SMTE), this program provides vocational training and qualification activities. It prioritizes individuals in vulnerable social situations, the unemployed, and those aged 18 and above. Young people aged 14 and older can also participate if they are enrolled in school or have completed their secondary education or EJA (Youth and Adult Education). Information and registration details for these courses are available on the `trabalho.prefeitura.rio/` website and the SMTE's social media channels. In-person registration is available at Central do Trabalhador posts, and online registration can be completed via the SMTE portal and social media. Applicants are required to present identification, CPF, proof of schooling, and proof of residence [1]. The program includes specific initiatives such as "Rio + Cursos Mulher," "Rio + Cursos na Escola," "Rio + Cursos Diversidade," and "Rio + Cursos 60+" tailored to different demographic groups [2].

*   **Plataforma Rio On:** This digital learning platform, a joint initiative of the Secretaria Municipal de Ci√™ncia e Tecnologia and Senac RJ, offers free online courses focused on digital literacy and job market readiness. The courses are designed to develop 21st-century skills and have durations ranging from 8 to 60 hours. Eligibility criteria include being a resident of Rio de Janeiro and being at least 16 years old. [3] The platform features a variety of IT-related courses, including Database Development, Introduction to Artificial Intelligence, Webdesign, Excel, Digital Marketing, and Power BI. [3]

*   **Naves do Conhecimento:** These are municipal facilities that provide free courses, workshops, and events centered on technology and entrepreneurship, serving as hubs for digital inclusion within the city. [4]

**Specific Course Offerings:**

*   **Electrician Courses:** The **Escola Light** offers a free three-month (208-hour) electrician training program. This course covers fundamental electrical concepts, NR-10, NR-33, NR-35, and aerial network maneuvers, with practical training conducted at Light facilities. [4] Other search results mentioning electrician courses were either from different municipalities or less official sources. [3]

*   **IT/Informatics Courses:** The **Plataforma Rio On** provides a comprehensive selection of IT courses, including those focused on programming, web design, data analysis (e.g., Power BI, Excel), and digital marketing. [3] Additionally, the **Naves do Conhecimento** offer technology-focused training programs. [4] The **Projeto Gera√ß√£o Crescer**, under the SMTE, offers free distance learning (EAD) courses in technology and job market preparation.

 [3]**Official Information Sources:**

*   Secretaria Municipal de Trabalho e Renda (SMTE): `trabalho.prefeitura.rio/`.
* [1]   Plataforma Rio On: `rioon.rio.br`.
* [3]   Portal Carioca Digital: Provides information on various municipal services and programs.
* [3]   For inquiries regarding municipal services, the public can contact the central service number 1746.

The [1] current date is Monday, August 11, 2025.

 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/ciencia-e-tecnologia/prefeitura-tem-mais-de-600-vagas-em-cursos-gratuitos-na-plataforma-rio-on/)

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Credencial de Estacionamento para Idosos no Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

The Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso in Rio de Janeiro is a permit that allows individuals aged 60 years or older to utilize designated parking spaces for free in public areas [1]. While the card grants access to preferential parking spots in private establishments such as malls, it does not exempt the user from payment in these locations [2]. The permit is valid nationwide [1].

**Eligibility Criteria:**
To be eligible for the Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso, applicants must be 60 years of age or older [1].

**Application Process:**
The application for the Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso can be completed through several methods:

1.  **Online via Carioca Digital:** Applicants can access the Carioca Digital portal (carioca.rio) and navigate to the "Ve√≠culo e Estacionamento" section, then select "Cart√£o de Estacionamento do Idoso." It is possible to print the card directly from the website.
2 [1].  **In Person:** Applications can also be submitted at designated service points of the Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR). Specific addresses for these service points are available.
3 [3].  **By Mail:** The card can be requested by sending a registered letter with acknowledgment of receipt (AR).
 [1]
**Required Documentation:**
The documentation required may vary slightly depending on the application method. Generally, the following are needed:

*   **For Online Applications:** Personal information is typically entered into the system. Specific documents might be required for verification or printing purposes.
 [1]*   **For In-Person or Mail Applications:**
    *   A formal request (Requerimento) addressed to the Coordinator of Regulation and Road Infractions of the SMTR.
 [1]    *   A simple copy of the applicant's official identification document (such as an RG or Carteira Nacional de Habilita√ß√£o - CNH) that includes a photo, signature, and CPF number.
   [1]  *   A simple copy of a recent proof of residence in the applicant's name.

* [1]*Card Validity and Usage:**
The Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso has a validity period of five years, after which a new card must be requested. The [1] card must be displayed in a visible location on the vehicle's dashboard. It [3] can be used in any vehicle, provided the elderly person is using it. In [2] public parking areas managed by the "Rio Rotativo" system, the card grants exemption from payment. However [1], in private establishments like shopping malls, the card allows the use of preferential parking spots but does not waive any associated fees. Each [2] CPF can only be used to issue one parking permit for the elderly. The [1] card features a QR Code, which enhances transparency and allows for public verification. If [2] a printed card is smudged, has color discrepancies, or is cut off, it may be considered invalid. ## Research Artifact: Appealing Traffic Tickets in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

To appeal a traffic ticket issued by the Prefecture of Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize several methods, primarily through the Carioca Digital portal, but also via email or postal mail for certain procedures. The process involves submitting a "Defesa Pr√©via" (Preliminary Defense) or other forms of appeal, depending on the stage of the infraction. [1]

### Methods for Submitting Appeals:

1.  **Carioca Digital Portal:** This is the primary digital channel for submitting appeals, including Defesa Pr√©via and Real Infrator (indicating the actual driver) for individuals. Users must log in to the portal (carioca.rio), navigate to "Ve√≠culo e Estacionamento," select "Recurso de multas," and then choose the specific infraction to file the Defesa Pr√©via. Documents [2] can be uploaded directly to the portal, with specified file size and format limitations (up to 5MB, in .pdf, .png, .jpg, or .jpeg).
2. [3]  **Email:** Appeals for "Recurso de Notifica√ß√£o da Penalidade (Cancelamento de Multa)" and "Recurso da Notifica√ß√£o de Autua√ß√£o (Defesa Pr√©via)" can be submitted via email to multas.smtr@gmail.com. The email subject should include the infraction number, and necessary documents must be attached.
3.  **Postal [1] Mail:** Appeals can also be sent by postal mail with Aviso de Recebimento (AR) to the headquarters of the Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) at Rua Dom Marcos Barbosa, 2 - Loja 1 - Cidade Nova ‚Äì RJ, CEP 20211-178.
4.  **In-Person [3]:** For requests related to the cancellation of fines or restitution of amounts paid, in-person submission at SMTR decentralized posts or the central protocol may be required, often necessitating prior scheduling.

### Required [2] Documentation for Appeals:

The documentation required for an appeal generally includes:

*   A completed application/request form (Requerimento).
*   A copy of [2] the notification of autua√ß√£o, auto de infra√ß√£o, or a document from SMTR containing the vehicle's plate and infraction number.
*   A copy of the [2] vehicle's Certificate of Registration and Licensing (CRLV).
*   A copy of the [2] applicant's National Driver's License (CNH) or another valid identification document that proves their signature. If the applicant is a legal entity, documentation proving representation is necessary.
*   A power of attorney [2], if applicable.
*   Proof of residence [2], particularly if the appeal is based on the non-receipt of the notification.
*   Any supporting [2] evidence or documents that substantiate the claims made in the appeal.

For specific situations [3], such as suspected vehicle cloning, additional documents like a police report, expert report, and vehicle photographs are required.

### Structure and [3] Content of an Appeal Letter:

While a specific downloadable "model letter" is not directly provided in the search results, the information gathered indicates the essential components and structure for an appeal:

*   **Addressee:** The appeal should be addressed to the Secretary of Municipal Transport.
*   **Applicant [2] Information:** Include full name, address, electronic contact information, neighborhood, postal code, CNH/ID number, CPF/CNPJ number, and phone number.
*   **Type of Request [2]:** Clearly state whether the request is for "Defesa Pr√©via" or "Cancelamento de Multa".
*   **Arguments  [2](Alega√ß√µes):** Present the reasons for the appeal clearly and concisely. This section should detail any alleged errors in the infraction notice, such as incorrect vehicle data, inconsistencies in the location or time of the offense, or lack of sufficient evidence to support the infraction. Potential arguments [2] could include "DA AUS√äNCIA DE NOTIFICA√á√ÉO PR√âVIA" (lack of prior notification) if applicable.
*   **Vehicle Information [4]:** Include details such as the vehicle's make, model, plate number, and RENAVAM.
*   **Legitimacy:** Establish [4] the applicant's standing to file the appeal.
*   **Facts of the Case [4]:** Describe the circumstances of the alleged infraction as presented in the notice.
*   **Attached Documents [4]:** List all documents submitted with the appeal.

It is crucial to adhere [2] to the deadlines indicated on the notification for submitting the appeal. Opting for the 40% discount [3] on the fine implies an admission of guilt and waives the right to appeal. Incomplete or incorrect [3] information in the appeal can negatively impact its evaluation. **Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Remover carro parado em frente a garagem no Rio de Janeiro

**Summary:**

To address a vehicle parked in front of a garage in Rio de Janeiro, the primary course of action is to report the incident to the municipal authorities. The Guarda Municipal (Municipal Guard) is the responsible body for enforcing traffic regulations and addressing instances of irregular parking, including vehicles obstructing garage entrances [1].

**Reporting Procedure:**

Citizens can report a car parked in front of a garage, on the sidewalk, or in other improper parking spots by contacting the Central 1746 [1]. The 1746 service can be accessed through various channels:
*   **Phone:** Call 1746 or (21) 3460-1746 [1].
*   **WhatsApp:** (21) 3460-1746 [2].
*   **Mobile App:** The 1746 Rio app is available for Android and iOS [1].
*   **Online Portals:** Through the websites 1746.rio and carioca.rio [1].

**Enforcement and Response:**

Upon receiving a report, a Guarda Municipal vehicle is dispatched to the location. The typical response time for the service is within two hours [1]. The Guarda Municipal will issue a traffic infraction notice (multa) and, in some cases, may tow the vehicle [1]. The removal of the vehicle is an administrative measure handled by the Secretaria de Ordem P√∫blica (SEOP). [2]

**Legal Basis and Regulations:**

Parking in front of a garage, specifically where there is a lowered curb intended for vehicle entry or exit, is prohibited by the Brazilian Traffic Code (C√≥digo de Tr√¢nsito Brasileiro - CTB). This [2] is considered a medium-level infraction, subject to a fine and potential vehicle removal. The [2] CTB also states that parking in locations with a lowered curb designated for vehicle access is an offense.

 [2]**Vehicle Removal:**

If a vehicle is towed, information regarding its location and the procedure for release can be found through the SEOP system by checking the license plate or chassis number on https://jeap.rio.rj.gov.br/je-darm. The [3] costs associated with towing and storage (daily fees) must be paid to release the vehicle. These fees are calculated from the date the vehicle enters the depot, including weekends and holidays. Payment [3] for these fees cannot be scheduled or made via mobile app or internet; it must be done at bank counters, with only Santander and Banco do Brasil accepting payments at the "boca do caixa".

 [3]**Important Considerations:**

*   It is illegal to park in front of a garage, even if it is your own.
* [2]   Citizens are advised to remain calm and act legally when encountering such situations, avoiding any damage to the vehicle.
* [4]   Evidence such as photos or videos of the illegally parked vehicle can be helpful when reporting the incident.
* [1]   The service for fiscalizing irregular parking is one of the most frequently requested via the 1746 app.
* [1]   The removal of abandoned vehicles is a separate service, with specific criteria for what constitutes an abandoned vehicle (e.g., signs of collision, vandalism, decomposition, missing plates). Vehicles [3] in normal condition that are parked irregularly fall under the "Fiscaliza√ß√£o de estacionamento irregular" service. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/dlstatic/10112/4296177/4107216/ESTACIONAMENTOIRREGULAR.pdf)
 - [2] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10220543556763-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-estacionamento-irregular-de-ve%C3%ADculo)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/remocao-de-veiculo-abandonado-em-via-publica/)
 - [4] [doutormultas.com.br](https://doutormultas.com.br/para-onde-ligar-quando-estacionam-na-sua-garagem/)

### Research Artifact: Soliciting Radar or Speed Bump Installation in Rio de Janeiro

The process for requesting the installation of speed bumps (lombadas) or radars in Rio de Janeiro involves formalizing the request through official channels, primarily via the Portal Carioca Digital or the 1746 service. The installation of such traffic calming devices is subject to budget availability and the completion of specific technical studies to assess factors like traffic volume, accident risks, and urban planning considerations [1].

**How to Request Installation:**

*   **Portal Carioca Digital:** The request can be submitted virtually through the Portal Carioca Digital. This typically involves accessing the relevant service, logging in with an "Identidade Carioca" or Gov.Br account, filling out a form, and attaching necessary documents [1]. The Portal Carioca Digital is a platform designed to centralize city services for citizens [1].
*   **Regional Administrations:** Alternatively, requests can be formalized at the relevant Regional Administration office in the neighborhood where the installation is desired [1].
*   **1746 Service:** The 1746 service, which includes a phone line and an application, is the primary channel for citizen requests and information in Rio de Janeiro [2]. Citizens can use the 1746 service to make requests, provide feedback, and obtain information about various municipal services, including traffic-related matters [2].

**Information Required for the Request:**

When submitting a request, the following information is generally needed:
*   Full name of the street and its number [1].
*   A reference point for the location [1].
*   The names of intersecting streets, if applicable [1].
*   For traffic signals located in front of schools, hospitals, or public buildings, the request must be submitted on official letterhead from the respective institution [1].

**Process and Considerations:**

*   **Technical Studies:** The implementation of speed bumps or radars is contingent upon the approval of specific technical studies that evaluate traffic flow, accident history, and urbanistic aspects of the location [1].
*   **Budget and Approval:** The project's realization depends on budgetary availability and the approval of these studies [1].
*   **Response Time:** The expected timeframe for processing the request is up to 30 days after its receipt, although the actual installation depends on the aforementioned studies and approvals [1].
*   **Existing Speed Bumps:** For existing speed bumps that are considered irregular or are in disrepair, a separate process exists for requesting their removal or re-adaptation. **Research Topic:** Authorization to close a street for construction work in Rio de Janeiro.

To obtain authorization for closing a street for construction work in Rio de Janeiro, the process generally involves applying through the relevant municipal bodies. The Portal Rio 1746 and the Carioca Digital portal are key platforms for accessing information and initiating requests related to public works and street usage [1].

**Key Information and Procedures:**

*   **Application Process:** For authorization to close public thoroughfares, the interested party must submit a request directly to the Subprefeitura of their region [1]. The process may also be initiated through the Carioca Digital portal for licensing of planned works or repairs on public roads [2].
*   **Responsible Bodies:** The CET-Rio, in partnership with the Subprefeituras, is involved in evaluating potential traffic impacts and granting authorization for street closures [3]. The Secretaria Municipal de Desenvolvimento Urbano e Licenciamento (SMDU) is responsible for urban planning and licensing within the municipality [4].
*   **Documentation:** While specific documents can vary, general requirements for such authorizations may include an application form, a schematic plan of the installation, and potentially an undersigned petition from a majority of affected property owners [1]. For other types of public works or repairs, documentation such as an ART (Anota√ß√£o de Responsabilidade T√©cnica) or RRT (Registro de Responsabilidade T√©cnica) from the responsible professional may be required.
*  [4]  **Legislation:** The process is governed by legislation such as Decree Rio N¬∫ 43.038 of April 18, 2017, as amended by Decree N¬∫ 52.861 of July 17, 2023. This [1] legislation outlines conditions for street closures, including restrictions on impacting public services, collective transport, and essential facilities.
*    [3]**Authorization Conditions:** Any authorization granted is typically on a precarious basis, meaning it can be revoked by the public administration at any time. Furthermore [3], street closures must not impede public services like road maintenance, tree pruning, or public lighting repairs. There [3] is no possibility of authorization for structures affixed to sidewalks.

For [1] specific details or to initiate a request, it is recommended to consult the official portals of the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro or contact the Central 1746. [1]

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to report an abandoned car to the Rio de Janeiro City Hall.

**Synthesis:**

To report an abandoned vehicle in the city of Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the official channels provided by the municipality. The primary method for reporting is through the 1746 Central de Atendimento, which can be accessed via telephone, the 1746 Rio application, or the www.1746.rio portal [1]. The process involves providing specific information to facilitate the removal of the vehicle [1].

**Information Required for Reporting:**
*   The complete address of the vehicle's location, including reference points [1].
*   Characteristics of the abandoned vehicle, such as model, license plate (if visible), and its apparent condition [1].
*   The duration the vehicle has been in the reported location [1].

**Procedure for Vehicle Removal:**
Upon receiving a report, municipal agents will assess the vehicle. If the vehicle meets the criteria for abandonment, a notification will be affixed to its windshield, informing the owner to remove it within a specified period, typically five business days [2]. If the owner fails to remove the vehicle within this timeframe, it will be towed to a municipal depot [2]. The expected timeframe for the removal of an abandoned vehicle is up to 15 calendar days [1].

**Criteria for Identifying Abandoned Vehicles:**
Vehicles are generally considered abandoned if they exhibit signs of neglect, such as:
*   Collision or vandalism damage [3].
*   Evident decomposition of the bodywork and removable parts, including at least two deflated tires [3].
*   Broken windows [3].
*   Missing at least one license plate [3].

The municipality distinguishes between abandoned vehicles and those considered irreparable or scrap. Irreparable vehicles or scrap metal, which lack any mandatory identification plates and have structural damage rendering them unusable due to accidents, weather, or disuse, are handled by COMLURB (Companhia Municipal de Limpeza Urbana) [2]. Vehicles in normal operating condition, even if parked irregularly, should be reported through the "Fiscaliza√ß√£o de estacionamento irregular" service.
 [3]
**Legal Basis:**
The removal of abandoned vehicles from public roads in Rio de Janeiro is governed by Lei n¬∫ 5.301 of September 28, 2011, and Decreto n¬∫ 36.805 of February 27, 2013. These [3] regulations define abandoned vehicles and the procedures for their removal.

**Alternative Reporting Channels:**
While 1746 is the primary channel, some sources suggest that in certain municipalities, reporting can also be made to the civil police. However [1], for Rio de Janeiro, the 1746 system is consistently highlighted as the official route. The [1] Disque Den√∫ncia (Dial for Reporting) is also mentioned as a channel for reporting various issues in the state of Rio de Janeiro, with specific numbers for the Metropolitan Region and other areas, as well as an app. However [4], the 1746 service is specifically designated for abandoned vehicles within the municipality. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [grupoab.com.br](https://www.grupoab.com.br/blog/noticias/tem-um-carro-abandonado-na-minha-rua,-o-que-eu-faco/)
 - [2] [usezapay.com.br](https://blog.usezapay.com.br/multas/carro-abandonado)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/remocao-de-veiculo-abandonado-em-via-publica/)
 - [4] [justos.com.br](https://www.justos.com.br/blog/carro-abandonado)
